Calling for Beta Testers

Today we are pushing out a new OTA to devel_rc-proposed for the Nexus 5, followed by the OnePlus One and the FairPhone 2 soon after, this is for people to test the software, so don’t expect anything incredibly stable, we do expect this build to not be far from stable though, but we’d rather be safe then sorry, to make sure the software is up to par it will only leave devel_rc-proposed after 3 people confirm that it’s working to a high enough standard, so if you are a tester, please go install devel_rc-proposed, fill in this document and email it to ubports@lists.launchpad.net
